programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S06 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: The brokers explore Central America to find real estate options that fit the bill for two buyers looking for a change of scene.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S06 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Since working from home has become increasingly popular, Paul and Sonia are entertaining the idea of living and working abroad.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S07 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Mike team up once again with local agent to find a unique opportunities for residential investments.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S07 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Alan & Amber are ready to buy the property of their dreams, and broker Jasmine Xuereb is ready to help!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S07 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Rick looks for properties in Canada and abroad; Tav Schembri suggests Caledon; Mike Donia recommends Panama.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S07 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura aids Nick Regina and Michael Succurro of Spark Financial Group in purchasing a smart property investment.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S07 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Mike Donia locates an ultra-luxurious, private paradise for two buyers on Pearl Island, Panama, boasting 30 km of coastline and a rich marine sanctuary.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S07 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura Compagni teams up with Mataj Architects and The Parentela Family to introduce the first of the Hotel Vie chain of luxury hotels.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Downsizing can be a difficult transition & Jin's objective is to make it as seamless as possible. In this episode, Jin is getting outdoors by practicing archery with Mike but mostly just to compete for bragging rights. Jin's client is moving from a house in Port Credit to a luxurious condo close to the downtown core. They desire extra bedrooms for when their children are visiting, all the amenities, & waterfront views.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: It is time to upsize! Daryl's client is moving away from downtown Toronto because they desire a bigger space, more privacy, & tranquility. They have 3 children between the ages of 7 & 13 who need their own bedrooms & the lady of the house needs an office since she works from home. Daryl knows all about tranquility & goes golfing with Mike to discuss his client & Mike's listing for them.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Mike's couple is looking for their luxurious dream home anywhere in between Toronto & Barrie near HWY 400 in a prestigious neighborhood. They have a large dog, tall family, & want to start a family of their own. This means they are going to need a lot of space & want the house to be fully renovated or brand-new. Mike is the perfect agent for this couple because he lives, eats, & breathes the luxury lifestyle.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Mike's friend invites him to an Indian wedding & tells him about his uncle who is looking for a luxury condo close to the airport. Daryl, Inez, & Jin support & donate to Mike's charity after winning a bet amongst them & the amount is determined by how long Mike lasts in the ring boxing against a professional. This client is looking for an investment property & a place for him to live when visiting.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Somewhere to spend the rest of their days surrounded by nature sounds like a paradise to retire in. Daryl & Jin play some golf to discuss a potential listing she has found & Mike aids Inez in purchasing a new vehicle. Daryl's client has older children with their own families now so they are looking for a home with lots of land & nature. It is very important to them because they want to be able to have everyone comfortably visit & eventually retire here in a few years.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: A young trendy couple wants to start a family in Toronto but they need some help from these top million dollar agents. Jin is a natural daredevil & has always wanted to skydive with her clients. In Oakville, Jin practices at iFly that is an indoor skydiving facility. Jin's client lives a very active & busy lifestyle so they require somewhere with low maintenance but still has enough space for a big family. Inez takes Jin to her hair stylist Anastasia for some business & pleasure.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Moving in together can be stressful but fun because you are starting a new life together! Inez's client is selling their separate properties & looking for a house or condo in the city or beach area that is close to shopping, groceries, schools, etc. Inez's couple is not too picky & open to different kinds of properties. Daryl & Inez enjoy a beautiful bike ride along the beaches boardwalk to discuss her client & the perfect luxury listing he has found.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Remarrying is hard enough let alone combining two families under one roof. With a total of 4 children between the ages of 7 & 16 Jin's client is definitely going to need lots of space & land in a safe neighborhood. Daryl, Inez, & Mike attend Jin's band practice to support her & listen to the set list they have prepared for an upcoming charity event. Jin gets her nails done frequently & this time Daryl decides to join her for some much needed pampering.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Now that Kristen & Kane have opened an office in Toronto, they will be travelling a lot from Vancouver & want somewhere of their own to stay in. Daryl & the other top million dollar agents have a wide range to search over because Daryl's client is willing to live an hour or two drive away from downtown Toronto. Daryl, Jin, & Mike meet up for lunch in Port Dover to discuss business & later in the episode Mike & Daryl get their hands dirty in the kitchen at Sababa Restaurant.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Many people enjoy staying busy & always having a project on the go. Inez's client loves to build & create breathtaking properties. On their next project, this couple wants an interesting property, preferably waterfront, which they can use for an investment property or to build on. Inez takes her client on a private yacht so they can cruise around Lake Ontario & discuss the client's wish list.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Deborah & Vezi are an international couple that want to live in Toronto for one year but has no idea where to start looking. Luckily for them Mike, Jin, Daryl, & Inez have teamed up to find them the home of their dreams. They agree to split the commission & throw a yacht party for the client's decision. Mike arranges a private plane for all four agents to go to Montreal & discuss in style what the client is looking for.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Will Daryl be able to dazzle his clients and find a property that will take their breath away? This episode features the first two of four properties, with a special guest appearance by Design Generation builder and designer Carlo Rinomato.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: International luxury realtor Mike Donia jets off to Thailand to work with a client and good friend of his, Mae. She is moving back to her hometown of Bangkok to pursue her modeling career, and is looking for the house of her dreams. Mike has his work cut out for him, as Mae's long wish list will be hard to achieve with her budget.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: With the help of a Bangkok real estate expert, Max Gloeckner, Mike is confident he can deliver just what Mae is looking for. This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the client decides to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vicky is searching for a home in The Beaches for her and her family. No one knows the Beach like Inez Kudryk, so Vicky enlists her help in finding some stunning luxury properties to tour. With a grand budget and very particular tastes, Inez knows that Vicky will be a tough client to please.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E07 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Steve Bailey to save the day! This week's episode features the lovely couple Chris and Rosa as they search for the perfect home. While Rosa is mainly concerned with cutting down her commute, Chris just wants to feel a connection to a property. Luckily for Steve, he's got his sister Helen, an interior designer and home stager, to help sway Chris - and it works!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Unfortunately for Rosa, she isn't seeing the benefits of moving to a town around Cambridge. Steve's got some neat ideas, but will they be able to convince Rosa? This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E09 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Sofie Kehdi heads to the island of Ambergris Caye, Belize to help a friend and former client, actress and choreographer Zuzana Marosová. As a public figure, Zuzana craves privacy in her personal time and is looking for a relaxing space to unwind with her children.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E11 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Jessica and Mark are a young couple living and working in Thailand after meeting there several years ago and falling in love. They are looking for a permanent home in Bangkok, and after chatting with her friend Mae, Jessica knows that Mike Donia is the man for the job.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E12 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: With the help of local agents Max Gloeckner and Nala Gill, will Mike be able to find a place that suits the whole family? This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E13 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: After helping them find a home last season, Inez is enlisted by Martin and Cheryl to help them find the perfect investment property. While Cheryl wants a property with minimal work and no landlord responsibilities, Martin is more open to renovations and taking on some of the commonplace duties associated with property management.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E14 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase, with special guest appearances by interior design expert Shelley Alexanian and guest agent Mo Loulou.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E16 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase, with a special guest appearance by interior design expert Shelley Alexanian.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E17 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vancouver-based couple Jim and Shannon are looking to relocate to their hometown of Toronto with their two daughters. With a budget of 10 million dollars, they enlist the help of savvy realtor Sofie Kehdi. While it might first seem that Jim and Shannon are on the same page, the house hunt proves that they have some differing opinions on what makes a good investment.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E18 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase, with a special appearance by guest agent Tyrone N. Steer.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E20 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Off on another adventure! This episode takes Mike Donia on a whirlwind tour of Southeast Asia as he searches for a home for his clients, Antonio and Kim. Featuring properties in Thailand, Indonesia, and the Philippines, each country has its own unique charms to offer the would-be buyers. Monkeys, mangoes and mansions are in store for Mike as he continues his hunt for that perfect property.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E21 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vezi and Deborah love the house they purchased last season in Stouffville, but they are ready to make the move to the big city. They enlist the help of Inez Kudryk to show them the best properties she can find in Toronto, and they are especially keen on the Beaches neighborhood. Vezi works in the music industry, so Inez lines up some special surprises to wow her clients!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E22 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vezi and Deborah love the house they purchased last season in Stouffville, but they are ready to make the move to the big city. programme.sub-title: S02 : E24 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura and Steven are a young couple with an expanding family, and are ready to take the next steps in home ownership. They want a large plot of land for their young children to run around and enjoy nature, and a spacious home that reflects this new phase of their life. Steve Bailey is the man for the job, and with such great homes to choose from, Laura and Steve will be hard pressed to pick just one!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E25 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Sofie Kehdi heads back to Belize to help husband and wife team Rachel and Ben size up some resort properties. Along with their investors, Rachel and Ben are looking to purchase a resort on the island of Ambergris Caye that will provide the most bang for their buck. Each with a big personality of their own, it becomes clear this couple is not going to see eye to eye on what they want. Luckily for them, Sofie is a pro at mediating conflicts when it comes to real estate.

Kevin is happy to live anywhere as long as it has excellent golf courses. Eve will be glad to tell him that Guelph just happens to have 3 of the top ones in Ontario.

Laura's going to find them the perfect home.

programme.sub-title: S06 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Since working from home has become increasingly popular, Paul and Sonia are entertaining the idea of living and working abroad.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S07 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Mike team up once again with local agent to find a unique opportunities for residential investments.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S07 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Marshall and Maria can't decide whether they should buy a property in Canada (Marshall's homeland) or Cuba (Maria's homeland).

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S07 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Alan & Amber are ready to buy the property of their dreams, and broker Jasmine Xuereb is ready to help!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S07 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Rick looks for properties in Canada and abroad; Tav Schembri suggests Caledon; Mike Donia recommends Panama.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S07 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura aids Nick Regina and Michael Succurro of Spark Financial Group in purchasing a smart property investment.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S07 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Mike Donia locates an ultra-luxurious, private paradise for two buyers on Pearl Island, Panama, boasting 30 km of coastline and a rich marine sanctuary.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S07 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura Compagni teams up with Mataj Architects and The Parentela Family to introduce the first of the Hotel Vie chain of luxury hotels.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Downsizing can be a difficult transition & Jin's objective is to make it as seamless as possible. In this episode, Jin is getting outdoors by practicing archery with Mike but mostly just to compete for bragging rights. Jin's client is moving from a house in Port Credit to a luxurious condo close to the downtown core. They desire extra bedrooms for when their children are visiting, all the amenities, & waterfront views.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: It is time to upsize! Daryl's client is moving away from downtown Toronto because they desire a bigger space, more privacy, & tranquility. They have 3 children between the ages of 7 & 13 who need their own bedrooms & the lady of the house needs an office since she works from home. Daryl knows all about tranquility & goes golfing with Mike to discuss his client & Mike's listing for them.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Mike's couple is looking for their luxurious dream home anywhere in between Toronto & Barrie near HWY 400 in a prestigious neighborhood. They have a large dog, tall family, & want to start a family of their own. This means they are going to need a lot of space & want the house to be fully renovated or brand-new. Mike is the perfect agent for this couple because he lives, eats, & breathes the luxury lifestyle.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Mike's friend invites him to an Indian wedding & tells him about his uncle who is looking for a luxury condo close to the airport. Daryl, Inez, & Jin support & donate to Mike's charity after winning a bet amongst them & the amount is determined by how long Mike lasts in the ring boxing against a professional. This client is looking for an investment property & a place for him to live when visiting.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Somewhere to spend the rest of their days surrounded by nature sounds like a paradise to retire in. Daryl & Jin play some golf to discuss a potential listing she has found & Mike aids Inez in purchasing a new vehicle. Daryl's client has older children with their own families now so they are looking for a home with lots of land & nature. It is very important to them because they want to be able to have everyone comfortably visit & eventually retire here in a few years.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: A young trendy couple wants to start a family in Toronto but they need some help from these top million dollar agents. Jin is a natural daredevil & has always wanted to skydive with her clients. In Oakville, Jin practices at iFly that is an indoor skydiving facility. Jin's client lives a very active & busy lifestyle so they require somewhere with low maintenance but still has enough space for a big family. Inez takes Jin to her hair stylist Anastasia for some business & pleasure.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Moving in together can be stressful but fun because you are starting a new life together! Inez's client is selling their separate properties & looking for a house or condo in the city or beach area that is close to shopping, groceries, schools, etc. Inez's couple is not too picky & open to different kinds of properties. Daryl & Inez enjoy a beautiful bike ride along the beaches boardwalk to discuss her client & the perfect luxury listing he has found.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Remarrying is hard enough let alone combining two families under one roof. With a total of 4 children between the ages of 7 & 16 Jin's client is definitely going to need lots of space & land in a safe neighborhood. Daryl, Inez, & Mike attend Jin's band practice to support her & listen to the set list they have prepared for an upcoming charity event. Jin gets her nails done frequently & this time Daryl decides to join her for some much needed pampering.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Now that Kristen & Kane have opened an office in Toronto, they will be travelling a lot from Vancouver & want somewhere of their own to stay in. Daryl & the other top million dollar agents have a wide range to search over because Daryl's client is willing to live an hour or two drive away from downtown Toronto. Daryl, Jin, & Mike meet up for lunch in Port Dover to discuss business & later in the episode Mike & Daryl get their hands dirty in the kitchen at Sababa Restaurant.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Many people enjoy staying busy & always having a project on the go. Inez's client loves to build & create breathtaking properties. On their next project, this couple wants an interesting property, preferably waterfront, which they can use for an investment property or to build on. Inez takes her client on a private yacht so they can cruise around Lake Ontario & discuss the client's wish list.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Deborah & Vezi are an international couple that want to live in Toronto for one year but has no idea where to start looking. Luckily for them Mike, Jin, Daryl, & Inez have teamed up to find them the home of their dreams. They agree to split the commission & throw a yacht party for the client's decision. Mike arranges a private plane for all four agents to go to Montreal & discuss in style what the client is looking for.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Will Daryl be able to dazzle his clients and find a property that will take their breath away? This episode features the first two of four properties, with a special guest appearance by Design Generation builder and designer Carlo Rinomato.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: International luxury realtor Mike Donia jets off to Thailand to work with a client and good friend of his, Mae. She is moving back to her hometown of Bangkok to pursue her modeling career, and is looking for the house of her dreams. Mike has his work cut out for him, as Mae's long wish list will be hard to achieve with her budget.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: With the help of a Bangkok real estate expert, Max Gloeckner, Mike is confident he can deliver just what Mae is looking for. This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the client decides to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Will Vicky find the forever home of her dreams? This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase and special appearances by guest agent Jasmine Xuereb and mortgage broker Paul Meredith.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E07 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Steve Bailey to save the day! This week's episode features the lovely couple Chris and Rosa as they search for the perfect home. While Rosa is mainly concerned with cutting down her commute, Chris just wants to feel a connection to a property. Luckily for Steve, he's got his sister Helen, an interior designer and home stager, to help sway Chris - and it works!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Unfortunately for Rosa, she isn't seeing the benefits of moving to a town around Cambridge. Steve's got some neat ideas, but will they be able to convince Rosa? This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E09 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Sofie Kehdi heads to the island of Ambergris Caye, Belize to help a friend and former client, actress and choreographer Zuzana Marosová. As a public figure, Zuzana craves privacy in her personal time and is looking for a relaxing space to unwind with her children.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E11 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Jessica and Mark are a young couple living and working in Thailand after meeting there several years ago and falling in love. They are looking for a permanent home in Bangkok, and after chatting with her friend Mae, Jessica knows that Mike Donia is the man for the job.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E12 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: With the help of local agents Max Gloeckner and Nala Gill, will Mike be able to find a place that suits the whole family? This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E13 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: After helping them find a home last season, Inez is enlisted by Martin and Cheryl to help them find the perfect investment property. While Cheryl wants a property with minimal work and no landlord responsibilities, Martin is more open to renovations and taking on some of the commonplace duties associated with property management.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E15 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: This week's episode features Cambridge realtor extraordinaire Steve Bailey as he helps couple Dan and Melinda search for the perfect home. It's a real battle of contemporary vs. traditional as Dan and Melinda hash it out over where their future lies. Melinda surprises Dan with some new information, but can Steve surprise them both by showing them the perfect property?

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E16 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase, with a special guest appearance by interior design expert Shelley Alexanian.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E17 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vancouver-based couple Jim and Shannon are looking to relocate to their hometown of Toronto with their two daughters. With a budget of 10 million dollars, they enlist the help of savvy realtor Sofie Kehdi. While it might first seem that Jim and Shannon are on the same page, the house hunt proves that they have some differing opinions on what makes a good investment.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E18 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase, with a special appearance by guest agent Tyrone N. Steer.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E20 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Off on another adventure! This episode takes Mike Donia on a whirlwind tour of Southeast Asia as he searches for a home for his clients, Antonio and Kim. Featuring properties in Thailand, Indonesia, and the Philippines, each country has its own unique charms to offer the would-be buyers. Monkeys, mangoes and mansions are in store for Mike as he continues his hunt for that perfect property.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E21 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vezi and Deborah love the house they purchased last season in Stouffville, but they are ready to make the move to the big city. They enlist the help of Inez Kudryk to show them the best properties she can find in Toronto, and they are especially keen on the Beaches neighborhood. Vezi works in the music industry, so Inez lines up some special surprises to wow her clients!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E23 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura and Steven are a young couple with an expanding family, and are ready to take the next steps in home ownership. They want a large plot of land for their young children to run around and enjoy nature, and a spacious home that reflects this new phase of their life. Steve Bailey is the man for the job, and with such great homes to choose from, Laura and Steve will be hard pressed to pick just one!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E24 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura and Steven are a young couple with an expanding family, and are ready to take the next steps in home ownership. They want a large plot of land for their young children to run around and enjoy nature, and a spacious home that reflects this new phase of their life. Steve Bailey is the man for the job, and with such great homes to choose from, Laura and Steve will be hard pressed to pick just one!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E25 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Sofie Kehdi heads back to Belize to help husband and wife team Rachel and Ben size up some resort properties. Along with their investors, Rachel and Ben are looking to purchase a resort on the island of Ambergris Caye that will provide the most bang for their buck. Each with a big personality of their own, it becomes clear this couple is not going to see eye to eye on what they want. Luckily for them, Sofie is a pro at mediating conflicts when it comes to real estate.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E26 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Sofie Kehdi heads back to Belize to help husband and wife team Rachel and Ben size up some resort properties. Along with their investors, Rachel and Ben are looking to purchase a resort on the island of Ambergris Caye that will provide the most bang for their buck. Each with a big personality of their own, it becomes clear this couple is not going to see eye to eye on what they want. Luckily for them, Sofie is a pro at mediating conflicts when it comes to real estate.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Giulia and Scott have recently come into an inheritance and want the house of their dreams. Currently, they live in a modest bungalow in a busy neighbourhood but would prefer to live in a secluded house with a magnificent view. Ideally, Giulia also wants a house that has separate living quarters for her ageing parents.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Kevin is a retired, successful businessman. He is a single dad to Shannon and Jennifer. Shannon has been accepted into the Ontario Veterinarian College at the University of Guelph, which is Canada's leading program in veterinary health care. This is the reason they are moving to Guelph. Kevin is happy to live anywhere as long as it has excellent golf courses. Eve will be glad to tell him that Guelph just happens to have 3 of the top ones in Ontario.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura is on the hunt for a new home for long time clients Marino and Paula. The couple and their three kids would like a spacious house with a country feel to escape their hectic lifestyles. Due to Marino's busy schedule as a producer, he would prefer a house that is all-inclusive and turnkey. Their kids are very active want a pool and the option for horse stables. Laura's going to find them the perfect home.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Diogo is a dedicated musician working on his new album. He has been debating between moving to Miami or staying in Canada. Toronto is closer to his family and where he feels at home with his music. Danielle will show him some spectacular properties in both cities and see what he decides.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E07 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Elizabeth and Michael are retired and want to move closer to their kids and grandchildren. They want to downsize from their two-story house into a bungalow. Luckily, Eve knows all about luxury bungalows. Elizabeth loves to exercise and really would like a gym. Michael has a passion for cars and needs at least a three-car garage. Their current house is dated so they would love a house that is turnkey. Eve will do her best to find their forever home.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Tomarra and Rob had just married and blended their two families. As a new family, they want to transition to a quiet neighbourhood away from the hustle and bustle of Toronto. Steve is up for the challenge. Rob is a writer and plans to work from home, while Tomarra is a naturopath who would love to have her own studio. Ultimately, they want to start cherishing the real things in life, and that is spending more time with their kids.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A homeless man punches a singing transient over a racist comment. An assailant hits a sleeping man with a brick over a money dispute. A sobbing young man insists he was falsely arrested. A bar fight sends a UFC fighter to the hospital and the bartender who slugged him to jail.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: After falling down a flight of stairs while drunk, a young man is amazed he is in jail for refusing to go to the hospital. A correction officer tries to explain to a young man why carrying a gun-shaped knife is not a good idea. An expectant father is arrested after a gin-fueled rampage at his parent's house and misses the birth of his first child. A woman arrested for selling fake designer purses as real ones says she didn’t know it was a crime.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A woman stalking David Copperfield is arrested. An inebriated inmate voices her displeasure with the guards, and a man nabbed for driving under the influence of prescription drugs howls for his dog.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Tequila is to blame when a man's behavior gets him locked up. A woman tries to sell drugs online. A detainee in holding for a DUI is of the opinion that he’s been jailed for driving too slow.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An intoxicated woman clashes with officers but later shows that good behavior pays off. An experienced prostitute gives solid advice to a younger woman and begs her to get out of the “game.” An angry woman smashes her cheating boyfriend’s windshield.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A cologne salesman boasts and promotes his "magic potion". A man bloodies his neighbor in a one-sided feud. Taking an illegal drug has an unexpected consequence to one man’s face. Open Booking becomes a stage as one woman launches her singing career.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A drug dealer's mean-spirited girlfriend lands herself in isolation. The police deal with an inebriated man accused of throwing rocks, and guards attempt to defuse a situation involving battling cellmates.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An inmate swallows a stash of drugs and then comes down with a case of the munchies. A 72-year-old offers an unusual excuse for dealing drugs to teens at a mall, and a woman charged with assaulting a landlord fakes being sick to get out of jail.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A woman is brought in for attacking her boyfriend. A talkative inmate is moved to isolation, and an daring inmate attempts to escape his restraints.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: After refusing a breathalyzer test, an irate man bangs his head against plexiglass. A man transforms into a “cell warrior” within his holding pen. Soon to be released, an inmate considers the future.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: The night of the Mayweather-Pacquiao fight a woman pummels a nightclub security guard for an unusual reason. A man who claims to have served in the military confronts a Lieutenant and threatens fellow detainees in the holding cell. A “Pac-man” fan has a spat with his Mayweather-backing wife.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: After being arrested for domestic violence, a man is placed in restraints. An intoxicated man picks a fight with inmates over their hometown. A woman is arrested for assaulting theater guards.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A secret stash is uncovered during a search at a suspect's property. Two rowdy inmates don't quite hit it off when they invade each other's personal space, and a jaywalker experiences problems keeping his pants from falling down.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S05 : E12 Throw in the Towel
programme.desc: A man arrested for domestic violence threatens to put all the officers in jail. Inmates on kitchen duty get into a fist fight over a dish towel. A woman unsure about her sexual identity is arrested for trespassing at a friend’s home. Officers find an unusual bit of clothing when a man is changed into a jail uniform.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An angry inmate refuses to change clothes. A man in violation of his parole is stopped by officers for attempting to hitchhike. Two men claim they were beaten by their girlfriends.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S05 : E07 Old Habits Die Hard
programme.desc: An inmate demands that officers follow her instructions while in jail. A man insists that he has been kidnapped by the police and is being held illegally. An elderly man discovers that domestic violence does not have an age limit. A young woman makes the hard decision to turn herself in to change her life around.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: One man booked for intoxication is placed in a sobering cell for being uncooperative. An aggrieved woman claims Animal Control took her “baby.” A man tells officers he is a “child of God” and actor.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A prostitute gets busted on a slow work day. An intoxicated inmate tangles with guards, and an angry woman has cross words for a guard.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Portland, OR an intoxicated male suspect is brought in for DUI. In Salt Lake City, UT a happy drunk woman is pleasantly cooperative. An emotional detainee sheds some tears while in isolation. In Las Vegas, NV a man is strapped in a restraining chair.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An agitated man is overly concerned about his 30K watch. cries when he has blood drawn. An inebriated woman threatens her arresting officers with bodily harm, and a woman has no recollection of her arrest.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A woman refuses to wear jail-issued clothing. A man tells his tearful tale to officers, and a chatty inebriated woman is placed in isolation.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A violent ruckus ensues after a man is placed in jail. Secret prison communication methods are explored and examined. Later, deputies cautiously extract a disruptive man while his wife is held nearby.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A testy man is sent to the isolation cell to "cool off." A teary-eyed young man maintains his innocence. An inmate may have ingested contraband to avoid possession charges.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A dominatrix is arrested for playing rough. A father is accused of assaulting his daughter's boyfriend, and an inmate's negative attitude leads to trouble.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: To avoid self-harm, an intoxicated man is handcuffed to a booking bench. After fighting at a bar, a combative prisoner is arrested. Also, an unmarried couple squabbles during the booking process.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Deputies deal with chaos after volatile inmates begin fighting. Accusations of deceit plague a booking as a woman is arrested for drunk driving. Prisoners are restrained after causing a commotion.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In his holding cell, a man fights officers after taking Xanax. An officer discovers a suspect may be facing criminal charges for his son. K-9 units are needed during a search for improvised weapons.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Officers outwit a man who refuses to give his name. A repeat DUI offender is jailed yet again. An intoxicated man is taken into custody and once the alcohol wears off he reveals that he’s broken his sobriety.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man arrested on drug warrants is upset about the BBQ brisket he left on the grill. An intoxicated ladies' man flirts with the jail staff and an inmate finds it funny that he sold tree leaves as pot to an undercover officer. Brother turns on brother when a good deed gets mixed with alcohol. A man caught panhandling believes officers should arrest hardened criminals instead of him.

programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Fight For Your Right
programme.desc: A woman is placed into a restraint chair during intake. Punches are thrown and questions are asked after a fight occurs. After dodging a bar tab, a woman is also accused of spiting and biting.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An eccentric jail regular is welcomed back. Man fleeing Mexico details the horrors he escaped. Young woman describes her lucrative fling as a stripper. A woman finds that trying to drink away a bad boyfriend and then asking the boyfriend for bail money is not a good idea. A man collapses during booking after being arrested for drunk driving. Officers have heart to heart with a depressed inmate going through a breakup with a cheating girlfriend.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A ladies' man smuggles women's underwear into jail. A woman arrested at a traffic accident is incredulous to discover that smoking marijuana while driving is against the law. A young man charged with a DUI tells guards he fears he may become pregnant behind bars.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A passenger allegedly attacked a cabdriver. A woman describes assaulting her boyfriend with hot food, and a mother is arrested for leaving her kids in a car while gambling.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Las Vegas, NV a man who insists he paid for a speeding ticket becomes so incensed that he is placed in a restraining chair. In Sarasota, FL a belligerent man accuses officers of touching him inappropriately. In Portland, OR officers help a young mother and her kids.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man is arrested at a popular theme park for public intoxication. A detainee swallows his earring during processing. Officers attempt to restrain a combative woman in custody.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Two men are found fighting on security cameras. Meanwhile, an impromptu tattoo jail parlor is discovered and shut down. Later, a Russian man and his mysterious friend are excited to be in a U.S. jail.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A disorderly man shouts to the heavens and asks for divine intervention. Twin brothers are arrested after a fray with police. A man in women’s clothing is booked after harassing passengers on a bus.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A party of three girls are brought in after having been arrested for possession at a nearby music festival. Drugs are found on the person of a music festival attendee during intake. A slightly older party goer is taken into custody for possession.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An inmate goes on a rampage when he suspects police of losing his money. Officers have a tough time with a drunk man. An alleged prostitute is stabbed. A drunk trapeze artist takes a drive on his moped.

programme.desc: A media circus surrounds OJ Simpson as he is placed in jail for violating his bail agreement. During a body search, a man is tased and pepper-sprayed. A parole violation calls for all hands-on deck.

programme.desc: A prisoner refuses to exit his cell prompting an elaborate extraction. A man begins singing in response to his arrest. During a severe alcohol withdrawal, an inmate repeatedly escapes his restraints.

programme.desc: A man fights with his wife over a haircut then leads police on a car chase. A woman gets violent with her boyfriend and then calls the police on him. An intoxicated woman tells deputies she only had two drinks.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S22 : E01 He's the Gingerbread Man
programme.desc: A man wanted for unpaid child support hides from deputies. Officers respond to a sexual predator following a minor. A man with a checkered driving record crashes his car.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: When officers approach, a suspect flees into a fast food restaurant. A driver takes his granny's wheels for a dangerous spin with cops in pursuit. Sheriffs catch up to a man who fled the scene of a possible domestic battery.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A homeowner shoots at intruders only he can see. The driver of a stolen truck claims he’s just trying to return the vehicle to a friend. A argument about parenting styles turns ugly when a gun is pulled.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers recover a small bag of drugs from a crying suspect. A drunk woman hides a second ID in her back pocket. Police stop a vehicle that hit a patrol car.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A sting operation is set up to catch narcotics dealers. A man flees a restaurant without paying his four-hundred-dollar tab. A traffic stop for a tint violation leads to a felony arrest for narcotics.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: An officer assists with a burglary call at a mall jeweler. An officer responds to a domestic dispute call involving two newlyweds at a Las Vegas motel. An accident occurs during a routine traffic stop.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A woman bites the arresting officer and store manager after trying to steal beer. A passenger of a suspicious vehicle attempts to hide drugs. Police respond to a call involving a knife and two women.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Deputies respond to a call of a man shooting a gun in his front yard. Officers are called to a domestic dispute over a wrinkly infant’s shirt. Four armed and suspicious men are spotted by deputies.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Undercover officers organize a sting operation to catch drug users. A woman attempts to conceal drugs in her mouth during a routine search. A repeat offender is arrested after threatening offices.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers respond to a domestic dispute call resulting in an indecent arrest. Officers in Tennessee investigate a house known for drug activity. Officers in Southern California check in with a driver parked in a known drug hotbed.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Police pursue a driver who ran a stop sign. A suspect wearing a D.A.R.E. T-shirt is found to be in possession of drugs. A woman claims the drugs found in the vehicle she’s sleeping in are not hers.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A man rams his wife’s car into his daughter’s car. Deputies find a rifle in a suspect’s car that was in a prior altercation. A man claims to run a travel business after deputies find evidence of id theft.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A fleeing vehicle goes for a spin when officers execute a perfect PIT maneuver. Cops try to flush out a suspect who barricades himself inside a donut shop. Officers hit the meth mother lode when they stop a truck in a downpour.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Deputies are called to a vehicle burglary in progress at an apartment complex. A traffic stop results in the discovery of drug paraphernalia. An Officer locates a stolen van and discovers drug paraphernalia in the suspect’s purse.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: An officer arrests a driver who attempts to swallow drugs stashed in his mouth. An officer arrests a repeated drug offender in an area notorious for drug trafficking. An officer pulls over an unlicensed woman driver who is arrested for providing falsified identification.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S23 : E18 Spiked but Still Moving
programme.desc: A suspect refuses to stop his vehicle even after the officers spike his tires. A dispute over money results in a pregnant woman being attacked. A woman asks for officers to help her rescue cats from a trailer.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: An arrest is made in a notorious New Jersey drug hotbed. Officers find a suspect hidden under a mattress. A bicycle thief is caught red handed.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: An officer wrestles a squirrely meth user who thinks he’s the Incredible Hulk. Cops catch a drug-carrying sprinter when he runs out of gas. A belligerent suspect doesn’t take kindly to having his socks removed.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: An officer subdues a young man in mental duress. Officers stop a suspicious vehicle and find drug paraphernalia inside the woman's car. Officers respond to a robbery in progress.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A drunk driver rams into a pursuing police car. A man on a bike flees an area known for drug activity on a bike. A sniffling man attempts to hide a baggie with narcotics under his shirt.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers investigate a fiasco at a fast food restaurant. A routine pullover results in a drug possession arrest. A vehicular pursuit results in an ill fated foot chase, the suspect is taken to jail for an outstanding warrant.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Deputies chase a man who flees a routine traffic stop. Deputies find drugs on a man who gives them an expired license. Officers respond to a man attacking several patrons in a bar.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S25 : E04 Five Shots and Four Sons
programme.desc: Officers get more than they expected when they stop a cyclist and discover a deadly weapon. Four sons attempt to break into the family home after being banned. A homeowner claims he accidently fired five shots while cleaning a gun.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers engage in a high-speed pursuit of a stolen vehicle. Police spot a motel fire, alert the guests and contact the Fire Department. Officers pursue a suspect on a stolen motorcycle.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A driver takes several units on a reckless journey driving on the wrong side of the highway. Officers set up a reverse sting operation to capture a suspected drug dealer.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S19 : E07 Fire in the Hole
programme.desc: Officers make an arrest in connection to a string of robberies and recover discarded drugs and a gun in the process. An officer responds to a domestic dispute involving an intoxicated and hostile female. An officer checks in with a suspicious group of men in a high crime area.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A suspect is arrested after officers find a loaded gun during a routine search. Two men are detained after suspected of battery. Officers arrest a man pick-pocketing during Mardi Gras.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers coordinate a prostitution sting in a neighborhood. Officers pull over a vehicle with a missing license plate. Officers stop a woman driving a stolen vehicle.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers search for a runaway suspect with a weapons charge. A man admits to having a large number of drugs during a traffic stop. Officers respond to a man with a gun in an alley.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers apprehend a man in possession of stolen property brandishing a rifle. Officers respond to a call of brothers in a fist fight. Police intervene when a couple argues in the middle of the street.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers arrange a sting to capture bicycle thieves. An Officer conducts a traffic stop on a vehicle with fraudulent tags. An officer stops a vehicle after witnessing a prostitute get inside.

programme.title: Tom the Tow Truck
programme.desc: Poznaj Toma, wynalazcę z Samochodzikowa! W swoim nowoczesnym laboratorium tworzy wynalazki, aby rozwiązać problemy przyjaciół.

programme.title: Tom's Paint Shop
programme.desc: Zatrzymaj się w warsztacie Toma Holownika! Ten kreatywny malarz z radością ulepszy i nada swoim przyjaciołom nowy, świeży wygląd.

programme.title: AnimaCars Discovery
programme.desc: Poznaj Jonny'ego Toolboxa i AnimaCars i dołącz do ich licznych misji ratunkowych, aby przywrócić spokój w Animatown!

programme.title: Car Patrol
programme.desc: Wszyscy w Samochodzikowie troszczą się o siebie nawzajem. Patrol to specjalny zespół, który dba o bezpieczeństwo mieszkańców.

programme.title: Carl the Super Truck
programme.desc: Carl Super Truck i jego transformacje na ratunek! Gdy Samochodzikowo potrzebuje pomocy, ten superbohater wkracza do akcji.

programme.title: Construction Squad
programme.desc: Zespół budowlany buduje Samochodzikowo cegła po cegle! Pokazują, że wszystko jest możliwe z pomocą naszych przyjaciół.

programme.title: Learning with AnimaCars
programme.desc: Odkryjmy liczby, litery, kolory i kształty poprzez zabawne i ekscytujące zadania na świeżym powietrzu z załogą AnimaCars!

programme.title: RoboFuse
programme.desc: Robo wraz ze swoimi lojalnymi przyjaciółmi chroni Samochodzikowo przed planami Zitrona, chcącego ukraść źródło energii miasta.

programme.title: Super Truck
programme.desc: Carl Super Truck i jego gadżety na ratunek! Gdy mieszkańcy Car City potrzebują pomocy, ten superbohater wkracza do akcji.

programme.title: Ted the Train
programme.desc: Wszyscy na pokład ekspresu edukacyjnego! Ted to pociąg, który uczy dzieci o kolorach, zwierzętach, owocach, warzywach i nie tylko.

programme.title: Tom's Garage
programme.desc: Tom the Tow Truck pomaga swoim przyjaciołom z Car City, gdy ci potrzebują naprawy. Zawsze daje im coś specjalnego po każdej pracy.

programme.title: 90s Rock Anthems!

programme.title: The 1975: Fan Favourites
programme.desc: From 2013 to 2022 - 40 minutes of the biggest rock songs from The 1975!

programme.title: The Anthems!

programme.desc: Host Vanessa Gianfrancesco cooks up four dinners in minutes using her multi-cooker including a delicious Lasagna and mouth-watering Burrito Bowl with Chermoula.

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.desc: Lovely host Hana Etsuko Dethlefsen shows us how to make two of the most popular Japanese foods at home: sushi and tempura.

programme.title: VegHeadz
programme.desc: Chef Pino Di Cerbo begins his cruciferous crusade with a hearty bowl of broccoli and cauliflower soup, topped with toasted florets and finished with a hit of spicy black mustard. Then he mixes tender confit kohlrabi with some fresh and saucy kohlrabi to create a salad. Next up is a soba noodle stir fry, combining daikon radish with shiitake, scallions, and sesame. Lastly, chef Pino puts together some fluffy frittata-style muffins packed with tomato and spicy arugula leaves. Bravo brassicas!

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 Bursts of Japanese Flavours
programme.desc: Host Hana Etsuke Dethlefsen makes casual Japanese cuisine like Savoury Japanese Pancakes and Gyoza three-ways.

programme.title: Up the Dish
programme.desc: How many ways can salmon be prepared? Up the Dish is on a mission to find out! Tiera Singh's Salmon Salad NiÃ§oise is a staple of the French Riviera with shallot, eggs, and haricot verts, but she swaps out the tuna for luxuriant olive oil poached salmon - it may not be traditional but it sure tastes good! Poppy Sandler smokes the competition with a buttery Smoked Salmon Omelette, garnished with fresh chives and earthy goat cheese. Next, Micah Trainor skips the salmon but keeps the veggies for her steamed Tofu Nori Dim Sum Dumplings, with tart gingERS-pickled shallots and tons of green goodness. Missy Hui has the big finish; her Salmon with Béarnaise is cooked sous vide for a precisely...

programme.title: CombiNation Plates
programme.desc: Turkey, think Silk Road spices. Indonesia, lots of seafood and tropical fruits! Curious and adventurous host Bianca Osbourne is your CombiNATION Plates culinary guide through both food cultures. First, check out Turkish Spice Crusted Lamb Rack with yogurt and blistered peppers. Next, an Indonesian tribute: Crab Leg with Coconut Curry. For the 'common ingredient'? Two takes on tender, savoury eggplant! Turkish Eggplant is braised and served with parsley and feta and the Indonesian take is served with fried garlic and sweet soy. For the CombiNATION Plate? Peanut- chili Sate sauce replaces walnut for Pazili TrancÌ§a, a classically Turkish halibut presentation, also served here with unique,...

programme.title: Up the Dish
programme.desc: In this episode of Up the Dish, host Missy Hui goes back to her childhood with Chicken and Dumplings - comfort food for every age! The chicken-dumpling journey doesn't end there; Micah Trainor turns the dish upside down and inside out with her Chinese-inspired Chicken-Chive Gyoza, a crunchy-crispy dim sum delight, with an ovERS-the-top chili sauce! How does Poppy Sandler spice things up? Herb Gnudi with Red Pepper Sauce, a spicy-savoury dumpling that's coated in nutty brown butter and creamy ricotta cheese for extra oomph. Tiera Singh finishes with another European dish - Spinach Spaetzle and Crispy Prosciutto, straight from Germany! Chewy spaetzle, fresh spinach, crispy ham - this...

programme.title: Zach Kinda Cooks
programme.desc: Lazy and curmudgeonly chef and ex-Gusto writer Zach cooks one of his all-time favorite dishes – Big Boi Burritos! While cooking, he tells aimless stories, cracks bad jokes, and berates Sydney, the beleaguered camera person.

programme.title: Cook Like a Chef
programme.sub-title: S06 : E12 Game Episode with Chef Derek Dammann
programme.desc: Game meats are on the menu for Chef Derek Dammann in this protein-packed episode of Cook Like a Chef.

programme.title: Bring On The Karbs
programme.desc: Chefs Erica and Josh Karbelnik go head-to-head to see who can come up with the most tantalizing meal based on childhood memories! Josh makes pan con tomate, Bolognese, and strawberry ice cream, while Erica prepares paella, churros, and sangria!

programme.title: Generation Cooks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 This Is Gonna Be Fun
programme.desc: Aspiring kid Chefs make raspberry lemonade and test kitchen hacks, Liam whips up popular Japanese street food dish okonomiyaki, while Jae-Anthony and his father Wendell make vegetarian General Tao tofu!

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.sub-title: S03 : E23 Olives: The Most Useful Ingredient
programme.desc: Is there anything more Greek than olives? Host Joanna Chery shows us how versatile the olive really is by cooking up four diverse Greek dishes. To start, a rich, baked-to-perfection Olive Bread loaded with strong, slightly fruity black Kalamata olives. She then prepares a refreshing Greek Village Salad full of seasonal vegetables, creamy feta, and plump juicy olives tossed in extra virgin olive oil. And guess what? It pairs great with fried Olive Bread! Then, Joanna switches it up with wonderful green olives - the star in her delicious stuffing for Apricot and Feta-Stuffed Chicken Thighs. Finally, we're graced with a unique dessert - Saint Fanourios Cake. Joanna adds metaxa (Greek...

programme.title: Spice Secrets
programme.desc: If mace, fenugreek, and cloves aren't at the front of your spice shelf yet, they will be by the end of this episode! Co-hosts Shahir Massoud and Jasmin Ibrahim bring these spices to a trio of fabulous recipes! First, octopus gets a slow bath in mace-scented olive oil before picking up a smoky char on the grill. A refreshing Thai Mango Salad gets amped up with the big flavour of fenugreek. Lastly, lamb chops get treated to an aromatic marinade of clove-spiked basil and parsley pesto.

programme.title: The Latin Kitchen
programme.desc: Spanish host Luis "Tigretón" Leon shares his take on four traditional dishes from the Basque region.

programme.title: Gusto's QR Countdown
programme.desc: Unlock Gusto TV's top recipes on QR Countdown! Thousands of viewers scan our QR codes to access our delicious dishes. Now, we're serving up 8 of our most popular recipes for feeding a crowd, from hosts like Kyle Crawford and Vanessa Gianfrancesco.

programme.title: Watts On the Grill

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.desc: What better way to start a meal than with dessert? Lebanese home cook Jasmin Ibrahim shows us how to make a gooey cheese pastry doused in sweet syrup called Knafeh. With a buttery golden-brown crust, oozy melted cheese and fragrant rose water, this decadent dessert will surely satisfy your sweet tooth. Next on the menu, a Lebanese classic - pita bread. You'll never buy it from the store again with this delightfully easy recipe! Jasmin then prepares a well-known Lebanese sandwich - you guessed it, Shawarma! Loaded with charred chicken, a popular Lebanese 7 spice mix, and yummy garlic sauce, this might be the best sandwich ever! Finally, Jasmin cooks up a batch of tasty Beirut Spicy Fish -...

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.desc: Greek home cook Joanna Chery kicks off this episode of One World Kitchen by showcasing popular recipes from Athens. She begins by preparing Chicken Souvlaki with Tzatziki, a classic dish featuring succulent, beautifully charred chicken skewers and a refreshing cucumber yogurt garlic dipping sauce. Next, she fries up some deliciously flaky cod with an irresitble garlic-potato dip, a staple recipe for Greece's Independence Day. Another popular dish in the Greek culture is Lamb Fricassee. It includes crispy, browned lamb pieces, juicy beef stock and a lovely egg - so savoury! Don't forget, we need a perfect dessert to follow a rich and hearty lamb dish: fried dough balls. programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.desc: The Lebanese love their stuffed foods, and host Jasmin Ibrahim shows us just how to do it! To start, she eloquently crafts golden Spinach and Feta Turnovers. Then, she stuffs a delicious zucchini with tender beef, crunchy nuts, and soft basmati rice, and smothers it in a flavourful tomato sauce. Next up, Stuffed Lamb and Bulgur Balls - small torpedo shaped balls of juicy minced meat, light and nutty bulgur, and a medley of aromatic spices. Her final dish? A date-stuffed cookie called Maamoul. Normally made for special occasions, these sweet cookies burst with flavour.

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.sub-title: S03 : E23 Olives: The Most Useful Ingredient
programme.desc: Is there anything more Greek than olives? Host Joanna Chery shows us how versatile the olive really is by cooking up four diverse Greek dishes. To start, a rich, baked-to-perfection Olive Bread loaded with strong, slightly fruity black Kalamata olives. She then prepares a refreshing Greek Village Salad full of seasonal vegetables, creamy feta, and plump juicy olives tossed in extra virgin olive oil. And guess what? It pairs great with fried Olive Bread! Then, Joanna switches it up with wonderful green olives - the star in her delicious stuffing for Apricot and Feta-Stuffed Chicken Thighs. programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.desc: A modern European oil city built on the back of a rich maritime heritage, Aberdeen is the energetic kingpin of northeast Scotland. While the boom times may come and go, the dynamic coastal metropolis never ceases to thrill with its free museums, outdoor adventures and natural attractions right on the city’s doorstep.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.desc: Heather explores Požarevac and visits the ancient town of Viminacium. Later visits National Museum, concluding with Majdanpek’s Rajkova Pecina Caves.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Boarding Pass Rovaniemi, Finland
programme.desc: Emeline Nsingi Nkosi goes to Rovaniemi, where she visits a husky farm and finds out about about breeding and raising huskies.

programme.title: Xplore Bulgaria
programme.desc: For the people of Sofia, preserving its heritage is sacrosanct, and this can be seen in the way the city's infrastructure is built around its archeological treasures. Catriona realizes this when she roams around the cobblestone streets of the city. With every monument she visits, she finds herself transported to a different era, right from Perperikon fort, which narrate stories of the Byzantine empire, to Boyana church, which is home to some of the earliest examples of medieval artwork.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Great World Hotels, Four Seasons 1(Eng)
programme.desc: From lazing in hammocks by the beach to sipping drinks on a private yacht, Kim realizes that Maldives is the perfect destination to unwind in style.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 Food Fact Fun Rotterdam, Netherlands
programme.desc: From trying dishes like Stroopwafel and Palat Stoofvlees to visiting the Erasmus bridge, cube houses and wall painting on the streets, Alex explores Rotterdam.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.desc: Since medieval times Aberdeenshire and its northwestern neighbour Moray have been the richest and most fertile regions of the Highlands. Aberdeenshire is famed for its Aberdeen Angus beef cattle, its many fine castles and the prosperous 'granite city' of Aberdeen.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.desc: Explore Majdanpek with our host as the city brings the viewers closer to the treasures strewn across the Serbian countryside.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Boarding Pass Levi, Finland
programme.desc: Levi is Finland's largest and fastest-growing ski destination. Emeline is here, to find out the exciting activities that Levi offers, in summer.

programme.title: Xplore Bhutan
programme.desc: With snow-capped peaks rising over primeval forests and traditional villages, Paro is like an Oriental Switzerland. On a visit to Paro, Radhika explores famous monasteries such as the Rinpung Dzong and Takstang Monastery, and learns the history and legends associated with them. Along the way, she finds out the secrets to the quintessential Bhutanese peace and contentment.

programme.title: Great World Hotels

programme.desc: An invigorating spa treatment, a cooking lesson, a snorkeling session – Kim has experiences in the Maldives that leave her completely rejuvenated.

programme.desc: From trying Orange zest beer and traditional Dutch dishes to exploring St.Martin's Cathedral, Dom Tower and enjoying go karting and stand up paddle boat ride, watch Alex enjoy his trip in Utrecht.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.desc: In the enchanting landscapes of Inverness, Robbie’s journey takes a whimsical turn: from eccentric to downright magical.

programme.title: Xplore Bhutan
programme.desc: Actress and travel enthusiast, Radhika Bangia explores the enigma that is Bhutan, when she visits Thimpu, the capital city with no traffic lights and no skyscrapers invading the skyline. Here, she checks out significant sights such as the Tibetan-style National Memorial Chorten, the National Library and the Folk Heritage Museum in order to understand more about the beliefs, history, architecture and cuisine of Bhutan.

programme.title: Xplore Bhutan
programme.desc: Known as Druk Yul or the “Land of the Thunder Dragon”, Bhutan is the country of mountains, monasteries and mystery. Radhika Bangia finds this to be true when she visits Punakha, the former capital of Bhutan, where she marvels at the architecture of Punakha Dzong and gets to know the story behind the two rivers, Mo Chhu and Po Chhu. She also explores the sacred temples and Mebar Tsho lake of Bumthang, the religious heart of Bhutan, and gets to know the local legends.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.desc: Robbie’s journey to reconnect with his Scottish roots begins in Edinburgh, the stunning capital city perched on extinct volcanoes. Navigating the twists of the Royal Mile, strutting around the majestic Edinburgh castle and learning to sip scotch like a true Scotsman, he feels a tad closer to his heritage. The real fun kicks in, however, when he stumbles onto a rather flamboyant way to unleash his inner Highlander.

programme.title: Xplore Bulgaria
programme.desc: Like Rome, Plovdiv straddles seven hills; but as Europe’s oldest continuously inhabited city, it’s far more ancient. As Catriona takes a tour of the city to see its iconic attractions such as a Roman Amphitheatre, which was once the setting for gladiator fights, and the striking Baroque Saints Constantine and Helena Church, she begins to see how seamlessly modern life blends with the age-old ruins. Along the way, she realizes why Plovdiv is called the ‘Eternal City’ of Bulgaria.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.desc: Robbie’s adventures in Perth kick off with him immersing himself in the historic grandeur of the Scone Castle, where a mysterious stone tells tales of Scottish monarchs. But the real thunder of the Highlands awaits at the Braemar Games gathering, where tartan meets brawn, and Robbie learns that embracing his Scottish side involves more than just kilts and castles.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E27 Backpack Novi Sad, Serbia
programme.desc: Heather explores Novi Sad, the financial and industrial hub of Serbia.Starting with canoeing on Danube and later exploring the city and its landmarks.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Boarding Pass Santa Village, Finland
programme.desc: Emeline Nsingi Nkosi goes to Santa Village at Rovaniemi, where she reads some of the letters that children from around the world write to him.

programme.title: Xplore Bulgaria
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Xplore Bulgaria Sunny Beach
programme.desc: Luxurious hotels, thrilling water parks, inexpensive food and almost 300 days of bright sunny weather make Bulgaria’s biggest seaside resort, Sunny Beach popular for budget beach getaways. Catriona, however, stumbles onto the historic town of Nessebar, which is over 3000 years old, and realizes that there is more to the place than meets the eye. She goes on to visit the Castra Rubra winery, where she finds out about the history of Viticulture in Bulgaria and the process of wine making.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.desc: Benafsha embarks on a whirlwind adventure in Ahmedabad. With just 48 hours in the city, she is determined to make the most of it, but how?

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Food Fact Fun The Hague, Netherlands
programme.desc: From exploring a vintage car museum to scaling a 5 meter ice-wall and sampling a rich bread cookie, Watch Alex exploring The Hague, also known as the “International city of peace”.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.desc: A modern European oil city built on the back of a rich maritime heritage, Aberdeen is the energetic kingpin of northeast Scotland. While the boom times may come and go, the dynamic coastal metropolis never ceases to thrill with its free museums, outdoor adventures and natural attractions right on the city’s doorstep.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.desc: Heather explores Požarevac and visits the ancient town of Viminacium. Later visits National Museum, concluding with Majdanpek’s Rajkova Pecina Caves.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Boarding Pass Rovaniemi, Finland
programme.desc: Emeline Nsingi Nkosi goes to Rovaniemi, where she visits a husky farm and finds out about about breeding and raising huskies.

programme.title: Xplore Bulgaria
programme.desc: For the people of Sofia, preserving its heritage is sacrosanct, and this can be seen in the way the city's infrastructure is built around its archeological treasures. Catriona realizes this when she roams around the cobblestone streets of the city. With every monument she visits, she finds herself transported to a different era, right from Perperikon fort, which narrate stories of the Byzantine empire, to Boyana church, which is home to some of the earliest examples of medieval artwork.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Great World Hotels, Four Seasons 1(Eng)
programme.desc: From lazing in hammocks by the beach to sipping drinks on a private yacht, Kim realizes that Maldives is the perfect destination to unwind in style.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 Food Fact Fun Rotterdam, Netherlands
programme.desc: From trying dishes like Stroopwafel and Palat Stoofvlees to visiting the Erasmus bridge, cube houses and wall painting on the streets, Alex explores Rotterdam.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.desc: Since medieval times Aberdeenshire and its northwestern neighbour Moray have been the richest and most fertile regions of the Highlands. Aberdeenshire is famed for its Aberdeen Angus beef cattle, its many fine castles and the prosperous 'granite city' of Aberdeen.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.desc: Explore Majdanpek with our host as the city brings the viewers closer to the treasures strewn across the Serbian countryside.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Boarding Pass Levi, Finland
programme.desc: Levi is Finland's largest and fastest-growing ski destination. Emeline is here, to find out the exciting activities that Levi offers, in summer.

programme.title: Xplore Bhutan
programme.desc: With snow-capped peaks rising over primeval forests and traditional villages, Paro is like an Oriental Switzerland. On a visit to Paro, Radhika explores famous monasteries such as the Rinpung Dzong and Takstang Monastery, and learns the history and legends associated with them. Along the way, she finds out the secrets to the quintessential Bhutanese peace and contentment.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Great World Hotels, Four Seasons 2(Eng)
programme.desc: An invigorating spa treatment, a cooking lesson, a snorkeling session – Kim has experiences in the Maldives that leave her completely rejuvenated.

programme.desc: From trying Orange zest beer and traditional Dutch dishes to exploring St.Martin's Cathedral, Dom Tower and enjoying go karting and stand up paddle boat ride, watch Alex enjoy his trip in Utrecht.
